foreignData.name: Mittsommerfeier
foreignData.text:
Du kannst während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine Lyrikmarke auf die Mittsommerfeier legen.
{G}, opfere die Mittsommerfeier: Bringe X Bestien-Spielsteine ins Spiel, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Lyrikmarken auf der Mittsommerfeier ist. Behandle diese Spielsteine wie 3/3 grüne Kreaturen.

name: Midsummer Revel
originalText:
During your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Midsummer Revel.
o
G, Sacrifice Midsummer Revel: Put X Beast tokens into play, where X is the number of verse counters on Midsummer Revel. Treat these tokens as 3/3 green creatures.

rulings.text: Adding a counter is optional. If you forget to add one during your upkeep, you cannot back up and add one later.

text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Midsummer Revel.
{G}, Sacrifice Midsummer Revel: Create X 3/3 green Beast creature tokens, where X is the number of verse counters on Midsummer Revel.
